name: Hoppe-chan - Punitto Shibotte Daibouken! [3DS]
description:
Jackie Chan Stuntmaster (sometimes mislabeled as Jackie Chan's Stuntmaster) is a beat 'em up platform video game developed by Radical Entertainment and published by Midway Home Entertainment exclusively for the PlayStation home console.
It is based on the actor and martial artist, Jackie Chan, whom the player gets in the shoes of, fighting his way past numerous villains in different locations across the city of New York.
